title: Models
description: FOCUS helps you train your attention and stay present—one phrase at a time.

mainArticle.title: Models
mainArticle.content: FOCUS helps you train your attention and stay present—one phrase at a time.

words.definition: A representation of something, often used to explain or illustrate a concept
words.example: The model showed the new design of the car.

words.definition: Without a specific plan or purpose; without a specific goal
words.example: The students were randomly assigned to groups for the project.

words.definition: To return to a previous state or position
words.example: The computer brought back up to life after the power outage.

words.definition: People who are of the same age or who have the same level of education or social status
words.example: The students were assigned to groups with their peers.
